org.jamesframework.core.problems.sol

Interface RandomSolutionGenerator<SolutionType extends Solution,DataType>

  • Type Parameters:
    SolutionType - type of the generated solutions, required to extend Solution
    DataType - type of data used to generate solutions
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface RandomSolutionGenerator<SolutionType extends Solution,DataType>
    A random solution generator creates random solutions of a specific type, given some data. It is required that every request generates a new solution instance which is independent of any previously generated solutions.
    Author:
    Herman De Beukelaer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SolutionType create(Random rnd, DataType data)
      Generate a random solution.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        SolutionType create(Random rnd,
                    DataType data)
        Generate a random solution.
        Parameters:
        rnd - source of randomness
        data - given data
        Returns:
        random solution
